div.p: Recommendations #4 & #5 (2022 Draft CDC Clinical Practice Guideline for Prescribing Opioids - Pages 91-101 lines 2141-2393):

p.strong: When opioids are started or continuing opioid therapy, clinicians should prescribe the lowest effective dosage. Clinicians should use caution when prescribing opioids at any dosage, should carefully reassess evidence of individual benefits and risks when considering increasing dosage to â‰¥ 50 morphine milligram equivalents (MME)/day (recommendation #4 category: A, evidence type: 3) (recommendation #5 category: B, evidence type: 4).
